attributes.action: Change The Logo For The London 2012 Olypmics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new Olympic Logo is a disgrace, a failed attempt to appear trendy and modern that has culminated in by far the worst logo af any modern olympics. the promotion video has also caused epileptics to suffer fits. Overall the whole thing is a shambles and needs to be corrected before too much damage is done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
